resources.string: Vibrate in do not disturb mode
Use names from Contacts for suggestions and corrections
Warning: Disabling this setting will clear learned data
Use device personal dictionary to store learned words
Double tap on spacebar inserts a period followed by a space
Capitalize the first word of each sentence
Ignore other apps’ request to disable suggestions (may cause issues)
Don’t always show suggestions for web edit fields
Web edit fields (mostly found in browsers) are a very common cause for issues with the always show suggestions setting
Do not suggest potentially offensive words
Spacebar and punctuation automatically correct mistyped words
Auto-correct even when not explicitly requested by the input field
When enabled shortcuts might be expanded by autocorrect
On pressing space or punctuation, the middle suggestion will be entered
Use the previous word in making suggestions
Show recently copied clipboard content as a suggestion
Input a word by sliding through the letters
See the suggested word while gesturing
Move the preview during a gesture
Input spaces during gestures by gliding to the space key
If disabled, clipboard key will paste clipboard content if any
Perform a swipe from the delete key to select and remove bigger portions of text at once
Save or load from file. Warning: restore will overwrite existing data
Provide a native library to enable gesture typing

You will need the library for \'%s\'. Incompatible libraries may crash when using gesture typing. \n\nWarning: loading external code can be a security risk. Only use a library from a source you trust.
Unknown library file. Are you sure you got it from a trusted source and it is for \'%s\'?
Automatically insert space after punctuation when typing a new word
Autospace before gesture typing a word
Autospace after gesture typing a word
Show more letters with diacritics in popup
Show variants defined in keyboard languages
Try to detect URLs and similar as a single word
Replace period key popups with top level domains when typing URLs and email addresses
Pin toolbar key on long press
This will disable other long press actions for toolbar keys that are not pinned
Show hints if long-pressing a key triggers additional functionality
Suppress popup keys that are already present on the base layout
Change input method with space key
Long pressing space key will prompt input method selection menu
Long press symbols key for numpad
Select a file in a compatible format. Information about the formats is available %s.
Warning: layout is in currently use
If not set, portrait image will be used
Set main and up to 6 secondary currency symbols, separated with space
Pressing enter or space after other keys in symbols view
Pressing enter or space after other keys in numpad
Set image for day or night mode?
Physical Alt key shows the emoji palette
"Please check \"%s\" in your Languages & input settings. This will authorize it to run on your device."
"%s is already enabled in your Languages & input settings, so this step is done. On to the next one!"
"Next, select \"%s\" as your active text-input method."
Now you can type in all your favorite apps with %s.
Display application icon in the launcher
"Really replace user-added dictionary \"%1$s\"?\n Current dictionary: %2$s\n New dictionary: %3$s"

"Without a dictionary, you will only get suggestions for text you entered before.
You can download dictionaries %1$s, or check whether a dictionary for \"%2$s\" can be downloaded directly %3$s."
"Select a dictionary to add. Dictionaries in .dict format can be downloaded %s."
"Error: Selected file is not a valid dictionary file"
"The selected file is for %1$s, but %2$s was expected. Still use it for %2$s?"
"Error: script not compatible with this keyboard"
You don\'t have any words in the user dictionary. To add a word, tap the Add (+) button.
This word is already present in the %s user dictionary. Please type another one.
Loading will overwrite the current theme
This setting exposes all colors that are used internally. The list of colors may change at any time. The default color is random, and the names will not be translated.
Select colors for text and backgrounds
"You can find and share colors in the %s."
"You can find and share layouts in the %s."
Tap the language to open settings
Show features that may go unnoticed

► Long-pressing pinned toolbar keys results in additional functionality:
\n\t• clipboard ￫ paste
\n\t• move left/right ￫ word left/right
\n\t• move up/down ￫ page up/down
\n\t• word left/right ↔ select all
\n\t• undo ↔ redo

\n► Long-pressing keys in the suggestion strip toolbar pins them to the suggestion strip.

\n► Long-press the Comma-key to access Clipboard View, Emoji View, One-handed Mode, Settings, or Switch Language:
\n\t• Emoji View and Language Switch will disappear if you have the corresponding key enabled;
\n\t• For some layouts it\\\'s not the Comma-key, but the key at the same position (e.g. it\\\'s \\\'q\\\' for Dvorak layout).

\n► When incognito mode is enabled, no words will be learned, and no emojis will be added to recents.

\n► Press the Incognito icon to access the toolbar.

\n► Sliding key input: Swipe from shift to another key to type a single uppercase key:
\n\t• This also works for the \\\'?123\\\' key to type a single symbol from the symbols keyboard, and for related keys.

\n► Hold shift or symbol key, press one or more keys, and then release shift or symbol key to return to the previous keyboard.

\n► Long-press a suggestion in the suggestion strip to show more suggestions, and a delete button to remove this suggestion.

\n► Swipe up from a suggestion to open more suggestions, and release on the suggestion to select it.

\n► Long-press an entry in the clipboard history to pin it (keep it in clipboard until you unpin).

\n► Swipe left in clipboard view to remove an entry (except when it\\\'s pinned)

\n► Select text and press shift to switch between uppercase, lowercase and capitalize words.

\n► You can add dictionaries by opening them in a file explorer:
\n\t• This only works with content-uris and not with file-uris, meaning that it may not work with some file explorers.

\n► For users doing manual backups with root access:
\n\t• Starting at Android 7, the shared preferences file is not in the default location, because the app is using %s. This is necessary so the settings can be read before the device is unlocked, e.g. at boot;
\n\t• The file is located in /data/user_de/0/package_id/shared_prefs/ though this may depend on the device and Android version.

\nDebug mode / debug APK

\n► Long-press a suggestion to show the source dictionary.

\n► When using debug APK, you can find Debug Settings within the Advanced Preferences,though the usefulness is limited except for dumping dictionaries into the log.
\n\t• For a release APK, you need to tap the version in About several times, then you can find debug settings in Advanced Preferences.
\n\t• When enabling Show suggestion infos, suggestions will have some tiny numbers on top showing some internal score and source dictionary.

\n► In the event of an application crash, you will be prompted whether you want the crash logs when you open the Settings.

\n► When using multilingual typing, space bar will show an confidence value used for determining the currently used language.

\n► Suggestions will have some tiny numbers on top showing some internal score and source dictionary (can be disabled).
Learn from your communications and typed data to improve suggestions
Reverse direction when a right-to-left keyboard subtype is selected
Really clear all customized key codes?
Show the toolbar if input starts or text is selected
Hide the toolbar when suggestions become available
